text: Nonresidents of the District of Columbia may commence suits in the Superior Court of the District of Columbia without first giving security for costs, but upon motion may be required to give security pursuant to section 15-703.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 15-711.

1973 Ed., § 15-711.

DC CODE § 15-711

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Judgments and Executions; Fees and Costs. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Deposit or security for costs in Superior Court.
